snippet: The country’s top politicians on Sunday approved the delivery of thousands of machine guns and hand grenades, as well as hundreds of antitank missiles, to Kurdish forces battling Islamic militants in Iraq.
abstract: German officials approve delivery of weapons to Kurdish forces battling Islamic militants in Iraq; solid majority in Germany's Parliament backs move, while opinion polls indicate that up to two-thirds of Germans oppose decision.
lead_paragraph: The country’s top politicians on Sunday approved the delivery of thousands of machine guns and hand grenades, as well as hundreds of antitank missiles, to Kurdish forces battling Islamic militants in Iraq.

headline.main: Germany Steps Up Its Response to Global Security Crises
headline.print_headline: Germany Steps Up Its Response to Global Security Crises

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
